thread.section_title: Flashbay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flashbay | flashbay.ca
thread.title: Jenny Marshall

author: Jenny Marshall
title: Jenny Marshall
text: This was our first experience with Flashbay and have to say I was blown away. Mike (our service rep) was really great; responsive and professional. I literally placed my order after 6pm (PST) and had a full sample kit of ALL USB products the next day before noon. My order arrived within just a few days. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend Flashbay to all of our clients.
